details.title: Comparison of Sub-Millimeter-Wave Scattering-Parameter Calibrations With Imperfect Electrical Ports
details.abstract: We develop a metric to quantify the accuracy with which measured scattering parameters can be cascaded. We use the metric to compare five rectangular-waveguide calibration and measurement strategies at sub-millimeter wavelengths that correct to differing degrees for electrical-port imperfections.
details.journal_title: IEEE Transactions on Terahertz Science and Technology
details.sponsor: IEEE Microwave Theory and Techniques Society
